channel.title: MBallSectionsDR
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MBallSectionsDR, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Legendary drug lord Fabio Ochoa is deported to Colombia and walks free after 20 years in U.S prisons
item.description: One of Colombia's legendary drug lords and a key operator of the Medellin cartel has been deported back to the South American country, after serving 2...

item.title: Biden vetoes bill that would have given Trump more judicial seats to fill
item.description: President Biden on Monday vetoed a bill that would have added 66 federal district judgeships over a span of more than a decade.

item.title: Second chances go virtual as new tech helps prisoners learn job skills
item.description: Dave Clark was sitting in prison serving a 40-year sentence for a Ponzi scheme conviction when he got to thinking about his fellow cons and their stru...

item.title: It’s Not a Wonderful Remake
item.description: It Happened One Christmas may retain much of the thematic import and help remind people of Frank Capra’s Christmas classic, but it is otherwise best f...

item.title: Joe Biden’s Commutations Racket
item.description: Biden, or whoever is running the White House, should be ashamed.

item.title: The Most Politically Absurd Things Americans Had To Endure This Year
item.description: If this presidential election year taught us anything, it’s that there is no bottom in matters of the politically absurd.

item.title: Student Terrorism
item.description: Recent events at George Mason University show that student protesters are going further than just admiring terrorists.

item.title: Ben-Hur Is a Christmas Book
item.description: The movie is more suitable for Easter, but Lew Wallace’s novel is more about the Incarnation and people’s responses to it.

item.title: Boost American Shipbuilding and the Power of the U.S. Navy
item.description: The security of this great nation (and dozens of allies) is at stake.

item.title: Top Biden ally 'disappointed' by president's veto on bill to increase number of US judges
item.description: Sen. Chris Coons is expressing disappointment after President Biden vetoed a bill to establish more federal judgeships.

item.title: Report: New Photos Show Joe Biden Meeting Hunter’s Chinese Business Partners, Introducing Son To Xi
item.description: Then Vice President Joe Biden met his son Hunter’s foreign business partners during a 2013 overseas trip to China, newly released photographs show. Th...

item.title: Report: Nevada Investigates 180 Cases of Double-Voting, Hundreds More Potential 2024 Election Violations
item.description: Despite the open cases and apparent frequency of double votes, Francisco Aguilar stressed that 'the 2024 election cycle was more secure than ever.'

item.title: Shunning Friends And Family For Their Political Beliefs Is An Affront To The Spirit Of Christmas
item.description: As we celebrate Christmas, all of us, regardless of our political persuasion, should strive to live out Jesus’ words in Matthew 5:43-44.

item.title: Dozens of House lawmakers rally around funding Afghan visa program as Trump vows major spending cuts
item.description: Reps. Jason Crow and Zach Nunn are leading 49 other House lawmakers in a letter urging Congress to preserve the Afghan Special Immigrant Visa program.

item.title: Trump pledges ditching Denali in favor of Mt. McKinley, but Alaska senators pan plan: 'Awful idea'
item.description: President-elect Trump pledged to rename Denali back to Mount McKinley, catching heat from Alaskan lawmakers, including in his own Republican Party.

item.title: Biden vetoes once-bipartisan effort to add 66 federal judgeships, citing 'hurried' House action
item.description: President Joe Biden on Monday vetoed a once-bipartisan effort to add 66 federal district judgeships, saying "hurried action" by the House left importa...

item.title: Biden will decide on U.S. Steel acquisition after influential panel fails to reach consensus
item.description: A powerful government panel on Monday failed to reach consensus on the possible national security risks of a nearly $15 billion proposed deal for Nipp...

item.title: ‘Home Alone’ Hilariously Teaches Timeless Truths About Motherhood
item.description: 'Home Alone' isn’t just a funny Christmas movie. It displays a mother’s transformation from selfish, absentee parent to devoted loving mother.

item.title: California Democrats urge feds to approve high-speed rail funding before DOGE nixes ‘boondoggle’
item.description: CA Democrats are urging USDOT to approve more than $500 million in transportation grant money to fund the state's high-speed rail projects before DOGE...
